question:
Which of the following are the functions on Union Public Service Commission?
1. It conducts examinations for appointments to the all-India services, Central services and public services of the centrally administered 
    territories.
2. It serves all or any of the needs of a state on the request of the state governor and with the approval of the president of India.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The functions on Union Public Service Commission include: (1) conducting examinations for appointments to the all-India services, Central services and public services of the centrally administered territories, (2) serving all or any of the needs of a state on the request of the state governor and with the approval of the president of India etc.
